start_date.description: Specifies the date at which the source will begin pulling data for API resources which support it.

api_key.description: The API key for your Shopify shop.

shop.description: The name of your shop e.g: "myshop" if your shop URL is myshop.shopify.com. For custom domain name shops (e.g: myshop.com), this will be the whole domain name i.e: myshop.com
